Regulation Name(s): Assayed quality control material for clinical microbiology assays
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Cepheid Xpert Respiratory Control Panel used as external assayed controls for molecular detection of respiratory viruses with the Cepheid Xpert Xpress Flu/RSV assay
Indications for Use Summary: Intended as external assayed positive and negative quality controls to monitor performance of nucleic acid testing for qualitative detection of Influenza A (H1N1 and H3N2), Influenza B, and RSV A with the Cepheid Xpert Xpress Flu/RSV assay on the GeneXpert Instrument System
